src_original: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,  yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,  samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni,  śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni,  smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni,
